Module app.code
Package DAO

Class AppointmentSQL

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentSQL
public class AppointmentSQL extends Object
this class handles all the SQL Queries and statement made to the appointment database

      Returns:

      SQLException - for sql errors

    • findOverLappingAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> findOverLappingAppointments(ZonedDateTime startDT, ZonedDateTime endDT) throws SQLException
      This method does a query to find overlapping appointments and returns any overlapping appointments It runs 4 total queries if it doesn't find any overlapping appointments it returns an empty list
      Parameters:
      startDT - provide start date time of the appointment
      endDT - provide end date time of the appointment
      Returns:
      a list of appointment that overlap
      Throws:
      SQLException - for sql errors

    • addAppointment

      public static boolean addAppointment(String contactName, String title, String description, String location, String type, Integer customerId, Integer userID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      This method adds one new appointment
      Parameters:
      contactName - name of contact
      title - title of the appointment
      description - description for appointment
      location - location of appointment
      type - type of appointment
      customerId - customer id that the appointment is for
      userID - userID seeing customer
      start - start time of appointment
      end - end time of appointment
      Returns:
      true if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - for sql errors
